name: The Growing Prince
description:
The first game I ever made that was made for a friends birthday back in 2019. The timing also coincided with the weightgaming.com Gain Jam 2019 and it came 23rd out of 26 entries and thought I'd share with you guys :)

Please note that my artwork, Picture Editing and Game making skills have vastly improved since I made this in 2019 :P 

Contains: Male Weight Gain
